pageContext.claim: “We gave the farmer $16 billion because that was the highest amount that China had ever used to purchase your product. Sixteen billion. So we took it right out of the tariffs that we're getting from China. And, Sonny Perdue, you're going to be distributing that to all of the farmers over the next, probably, two months, right?”
pageContext.analysis: Fifty percent of farmers’ aid will be paid out at the end of August, in the first of three payments, according to Washington Post reports.
